response.overview: Ado's first live video recording, containing all 24 songs from the legendary Saitama Super Arena show held on August 11, 2022. In addition to the hits like ‘Usseewa,’ ‘Odo,’ and ‘New Genesis,’ the video also includes covers of the Vocaloid songs that Ado loves, such as ‘Darling Dance’ and "Zanelli." The luxurious Limited Edition comes in a 3-sided hardcover case with a 60-page live photobook, a poster (B4 size), and a sticker. Furthermore, only the Limited Editions include a special audio commentary track by Ado. The Blu-ray adopts Dolby Atmos® three-dimensional audio technology, providing a listening experience close to the actual live show.
response.title: Ado 1st LIVE "Campanella"
